bossDialog: (The air crackles with energy as a swirling vortex of elemental chaos forms before you, growing larger as it absorbs the ambient magic from the treasure hoard!)
(The Cataclysm manifests fully, the room darkening as it draws in all light and warmth. Even your bravest creatures hesitate before this embodiment of pure destruction!)
I am the end of all things, mortal. Your quest ends here, as will your pitiful existence!

master.dialog: Cataclysms are living embodiments of elemental destruction. They harness forces that could end worlds, containing them within their swirling forms. As a Master of Cataclysms, I've learned to channel their chaotic energies. The secrets of the universe flow through them - and through me! Care to witness the storm that ends worlds?
